description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:

   DIAGRAMNET-50073-VSD to PDF conversion, a big space before the actual drawing

   DIAGRAMNET-50146-Action cell is not properly preview able in the MS Office Visio 2013

   DIAGRAMNET-50180-VSD to PDF conversion, incorrect page number sequence
